comment: Properties that characterize a division ring among rings: it should be nonzero, have no nonzero zero-divisors, and every nonzero element ` x ` should have a left-inverse ` I ( x ) ` . See ~ isdrngd for the characterization using right-inverses. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2013.)
